ing: 5 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, cooked and mashed
des: "You can make these ahead several days and store in the fridge. If baking cold, let stand 30 minutes first. Originally submitted to ThanksgivingRecipe.com."
ins:
Combine mashed potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, milk, onion salt, and pepper to taste. Mix well and place in a large casserole.
Cover and bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 50 minutes.
